igraphlite 1.0.1

Independent vertex sets

Source: R/cliques.R
independent.Rd

A vertex set is considered independent if there are no edges between them.

Usage

is_independent_vertex_set(graph, candidate = integer(0L))

independent_vertex_sets(
  graph,
  min_size = 0L,
  max_size = -1L,
  max_results = -1L
)

largest_independent_vertex_sets(graph)

maximal_independent_vertex_sets(
  graph,
  min_size = 0L,
  max_size = -1L,
  max_results = -1L
)

independence_number(graph)

Source

https://igraph.org/c/doc/igraph-Cliques.html#independent-vertex-sets

Arguments

graph

An igraph_ptr object.

candidate

The vertex set to test for being a clique.

min_size, max_size

An integer specifying the minimum/maximum size of the sets to be returned. If negative or zero, no lower bound will be used.

max_results

At most this many sets will be recorded. If negative, no limit is applied.
